Class EndPhaseData

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.GamePhaseData
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.view.EndPhaseData
public class EndPhaseData extends GamePhaseData
Represents the client-side data and logic for the end phase of the game. This phase is reached after the adventure concludes, and allows the player to:
  • View their own final game state
  • Inspect enemy players' final states
  • Return to the main menu or wait for server confirmation
The class tracks both the local player's Player object and a map of opponents.

  • Constructor Details

    • EndPhaseData

      public EndPhaseData()
      Constructs a new EndPhaseData and initializes the state to CHOOSE_MAIN_MENU. Initializes an empty map of enemy players.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Player player, Map<String,Player> enemies)
      Initializes the end phase data with the local player's final state and the list of enemy players.
      Parameters:
      player - the local player's final state
      enemies - the map of opponent usernames to their corresponding Player data
